about_the_game:
Succubus Hunt takes place in a world where monster girls are incredibly common, and you're the only human male! Run, sneak, and struggle your way through this exciting demo with 15 sadistic, cute, and horny monster girls to encounter~!

Succubus Hunt is a 2D side scroller first and foremost! There are minor stealth elements focusing mostly on exploration, encountering girls, and light puzzles. There are side quests and numerous masks that allow for unique movement options and ways to interact with the world!

30 Lewd Animations
15 Encounterable Girls

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted are 18+
This game contains 2D fantasy sexual imagery intended explicitly for adults only:
-Non-consensual acts involving the player
-Sexually violent acts described through text
-Bestiality (Anthropomorphic characters)
-Suicide/Self-Harm (Life Drain, Energy Drain, etc.)
-Drugging/Drugged sexual acts (Pheromones)
-BDSM Elements
-Mild horror elements, jumpscares, white screen flashes
